div.a: Read More about LEARNING AT HOME AND COMMUNICATION PAGE

span.p: We use online Student Registration Gateway to begin your enrollment to Northridge. You must complete the entire registration process for your student to be enrolled. On the last page of this process, you will schedule a required meeting with the district. You will be given a list of documents to bring to your meeting at the District Office. You must bring all documents with you or you may be asked to reschedule your appointment, so that you have documents with you.
